title: 命令问题
author: MC........
txt_content: 怎么用setblock在x,y,z放置一个命令方块，里面有特定命令？

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
khghj-b
replies.txt_content: setblock x y x minecraft:（方块英文）

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: setblock x y z command_block 0 1 {BlockEntityTag:{Command:命令}}复制代码1.7把command_block换成137

replies.author: Real_Scl
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-5-10 14:35
1.7把command_block换成137
不需要换吧，1.7也认字母ID
